DOC.brief_summary: This study examine way attention may link temperamental risk anxiety , social behavior brain process . The study aim see temperamentally risk youth display attention bias towards threat , anxiety symptom reduce attentional bias modification training .
DOC.criteria: 912 year old meet exclusionary criterion ( split group base high low temperamental shyness ) presence permanent metal orthodontics implant metal device severe psychiatric diagnosis IQ 70 assess WISC
